page.title: 20AUTHORS OF THE SURVEY
page.content: The work for this survey was carried out by the junior children of Binegar School and the top junior class of Oakhill school, their class teachers and local people. As there is not enough room to enter all the names we will list family names only. Binegar School: Mrs C.Edwards. Children :Costi,Brown,Kenniston2,Nixon Rabbitts,Snook,Stone2,Goss2,Mallon, Selway,Bown,Chivers2,Croker,Bridges, Miles2,Williams2,Emery,McNally,Hiscox2 Carter,Glover,Gill,Pearson,Heathcote, Leaver,Lethaby,Miles and Woodland. Oakhill School:Mr. D.Barlow. Children:Churchill,Knox,Gait,Hill2, Parsons,Gibbons,Bromell,Cuff,Pickles, Candy,Barnett,James,Bodman,Eyles, Stevens,Bridges,O'Dea2,Shearn,McEwan, Tuthill,Gait,Wiley,May,Howell, Dalwood,Small,Wedmore,Mill,Curtis and Edwards.
